subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: “I feel burned out,” Jürgen Klinsmann said at a news conference while fighting back tears. “I have a great wish to be back with my family and my children and to get back into normal life.”
snippet: “I feel burned out,” Jürgen Klinsmann said at a news conference while fighting back tears. “I have a great wish to be back with my family and my children and to get back into normal life.”
